name: Port Verana
description:
Port Verana is an cozy 3D Quest Game where you have to help to help to build an Sailing Ship. To get the Resources needed to bulid the Ship you have to help several residents. And Quest after Quest you get one step closer everytime.

The Game takes place in the Medieval Era and plays in an small Harbor City. But something is wrong with the City since no can get inside or come out. Maybe the People living in the Harbor know something about the City and its circumstances.

The Game has multiple NPCs but not every NPCs has an Quest but some have rumors or clues. 
1 Big Area to explore who might know what to find in it.
5 Quests

Recommended Input is the Keyboard but Controller is half supported.
The Game can also be found on the Itch.io Site of the HTK. https://htkacademy.itch.io/
This Game was the second Semester Project of the Hamburger Technische Kunsthochschule (HTK)

Install Instructions
- Download the Game from this Site
- Unpack the Zip at your prefered directory
- Start the .exe and enjoy the Game.

Credits
